work.content: WE DO - Brand identity and visual strategy. Print and editorial design. Publications and websites

about.content: WE ARE - Lasse (DK) and Marlon (NL). Template Studio since 2014. Based in Rotterdam.

services.content: WE OFFER - A visual plan of action. Inventive ideas for web and print.Daring design.

contact.content: Let's Talk - Feel free to contact us for a cup of coffee. We can discuss our projects or (alternatively) our latest Spotify findings. We like to meet new people and are always looking for interesting projects. Hope to see you soon! hello@template-studio.nl

index.content: Template Studio is a studio for concept, design and code. We do brand identity and visual strategy, we create graphic and editorial design for print, we make lots of stuff for the web. üñê
